commit message: Added a simple homescreen widget that can be used to start and pause the ScreenFilterService.

Merge pull request #1 from raatmarien/master

Check upstream compatability.
Fixed issue where widget state would get out of sync when the ScreenFilterService is destroyed.

Merge pull request #15 from Zoraver/master

Add home screen toggle widget
Fix bugs updating widget when filter is turned off
Only show warning toast on filter open
